### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to harvest resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource before attempting to harvest. Move closer to the target resource (Iron Ore at x=116.5 y=-133.5 and Copper Ore at x=429.5 y=-315.5) before executing the harvest command.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Make sure you have the necessary resources in your inventory before attempting to craft or build new structures.
